alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 19 at 3:10AM CST until January 20 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT SATURDAY NIGHT TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures 19 to 25 expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, southwest and west central Louisiana and southeast Texas. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Saturday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from midnight Saturday night to 9 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Tyler
